Song.title: Are You Washed In the Blood
Song.copyright: Words & Music by Elisha Albright Hoffman Public domain

Arrangement.text:
CHORUS: Are you [F]washed in the [Bb]blood, In the [F]soul-cleansing blood of the [C]Lamb? Are your [F]garments spotless, are they [Bb]white as snow? Are you [F/C]washed in the blood [C7]of the [F]Lamb?
VERSE 1: Have you [F]been to Jesus, for the clean[Bb]sing [F]power? Are you [F]washed in the blood of the [C]Lamb? Are you [F]fully trusting in His [Bb]grace this hour? Are you [F/C]washed in the blood [C7]of the [F]Lamb?
VERSE 2: Are you [F]walking daily, by the sav[Bb]ior's [F]side? Are you [F]washed in the blood of the [C]Lamb? Do you [F]rest each moment in the [Bb]Crucified? Are you [F/C]washed in the blood [C7]of the [F]Lamb?
Arrangement.searchtext: chorus are you washed in the blood in the soulcleansing blood of the lamb are your garments spotless are they white as snow are you washed in the blood of the lamb verse 1 have you been to jesus for the cleansing power are you washed in the blood of the lamb are you fully trusting in his grace this hour are you washed in the blood of the lamb verse 2 are you walking daily by the saviors side are you washed in the blood of the lamb do you rest each moment in the crucified are you washed in the blood of the lamb
